about_the_game: Explore the dystopian world of Unplug, an Adventure-Puzzle Platformer game where you interface with robot bodies of varying abilities and machines in your environment that can help you solve puzzles and discover the secrets hidden amongst the ruined city. You are playing as Unit, a small TV robot that was once used for propaganda by a tyrannical regime. Unit awakens free of this purpose and ventures forward to uncover the past of a now-lost city.

short_description: Explore a dystopian world as a sentient TV Robot who plugs into robot bodies and objects in the environment to control them. Use their different abilities to overcome puzzles, find collectibles, explore an abandoned city and uncover its secret history.
